mapper.update: UPDATE VACATION SET VCATN_CONFM_STEP = 1, VCATN_REPRSNT_EMPNO = #{vcatnReprsntEmpno}, VCATN_CONFM_DT1 = SYSDATE WHERE VCATN_CD = #{vcatnCd}
UPDATE VACATION SET VCATN_CONFM_STEP = 2, VCATN_CONFIRMER_EMPNO = #{vcatnConfirmerEmpno}, VCATN_CONFM_DT2 = SYSDATE, VCATN_CONFM_AT = 'Y' WHERE VCATN_CD = #{vcatnCd}
UPDATE EMPLOYEE SET EMP_YRYC_USE = (EMP_YRYC_USE + #{vcatnYrycCo}), EMP_YRYC_REMNDR = (EMP_YRYC_REMNDR - #{vcatnYrycCo}) WHERE EMP_NO = #{vcatnSelfEmpno}
UPDATE EMPLOYEE SET EMP_OFFHOD_USE = (EMP_OFFHOD_USE + #{vcatnYrycCo}), EMP_OFFHOD_REMNDR = (EMP_OFFHOD_REMNDR - #{vcatnYrycCo}) WHERE EMP_NO = #{vcatnSelfEmpno}
UPDATE EMPLOYEE SET EMP_SICKNS_USE = (EMP_SICKNS_USE + #{vcatnYrycCo}), EMP_SICKNS_REMNDR = (EMP_SICKNS_REMNDR - #{vcatnYrycCo}) WHERE EMP_NO = #{vcatnSelfEmpno}
UPDATE VACATION SET VCATN_CONFM_STEP = 2, VCATN_RJCT_EMPNO = #{vcatnRjctEmpno}, VCATN_RJCT_RESN = #{vcatnRjctResn}, VCATN_RJCT_DT = SYSDATE, VCATN_CONFM_AT = 'N' WHERE VCATN_CD = #{vcatnCd}
